0:
[[runners]]
  [runners.kubernetes]
    namespace = "{{.Release.Namespace}}"
    image = "ubuntu:20.04"
    [runners.cache]
      Type = "s3"
      Path = "runner"
      Shared = true
      [runners.cache.s3]
        ServerAddress = "${SECRET_MINIO_HOST}"
        BucketName = "gitlab-cache"
        BucketLocation = "minio"
        Insecure = false
        AuthenticationType = "access-key"
A modern, secure, highly customizable application dashboard.

0:
[ups]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "APC Back-UPS RS 900G"
  vendorid = 051d
  productid = 0002
  serial = 3B1227X00136

[monuser]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave
[monmaster]
  password = secret
  upsmon master

[rack]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  pollinterval = 15
  desc = Rack UPS
